title: Current & Former Members Of DEATH ANGEL, EXODUS, HIRAX & More Launch New Band NEFARIOUS
description: Plus some members of Blind Illusion. The post Current & Former Members Of DEATH ANGEL, EXODUS, HIRAX & More Launch New Band NEFARIOUS appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: Plus some members of Blind Illusion.
text: Hey look, a bunch of big-name thrash guys have a new band called Nefarious! The band consists of vocalist Katon W. De Pena (Hirax), guitarists Rick Hunolt (Diehumane, ex-Exodus) and Doug Piercy (Heathen, Anvil Chorus, Blind Illusion), bassist Tom Gears (Blind Illusion, Ancient Mariner), and drummer Will "Beastman" Carroll (Death Angel). "We're not a band," said Katon De Pena. "We are a Gang ready to Crush Skulls and Make Eardrums Bleed… Necks will be sore…!!" Hunolt said of the project: "I'm so honored to be with this amazing group of dudes about to release some old-school thrash on you mofos, it's long overdue and I'm confident you guys will love it as much as we do you our metal brothers and sisters deserve it, see you on the road, let's fuckin go!!!" You can check out Nefarious' debut single "One Nation Enslaved" above, which heralds the release of their debut album Addicted To Power due out June 18. Pre-orders are available here. Nefarious will also be playing a hometown album release show on July 19 at DNA Lounge in San Francisco. Want More Metal?
